title: #051 - BILL BURR - UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT
description:
Welcome to Uncle Joey's Joint.....

Monday, March 29th.....

Today, we talked to the Great BILL BURR.....

This episode is brought to you by DraftKings & CBD Lion......

Go to https://www.DraftKings.com and enter Promo Code: JOEY

Go to https://www.CBDLion.com and enter Promo Code: JOEY or CHURCH

And don’t forget.....

The Mind Of Joey Diaz is on PATREON:

https://www.patreon.com/joeydiaz

#JoeyDiaz #Madflavor #UncleJoeysJoint #BillBurr

Huge Thanks to BEN TELFORD for the Tremendous intro video.....

You can find Ben here:

Ben Telford Visuals

Cinematography and Visual Promotion Agency, Ontario, Canada

visuals@benjamintelford.com

Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/b_telford or https://www.instagram.com/bentelfordvisuals
